title: The Blockies Guide - Managing weeds on small farms and acres

subtasks: Preventing weeds from entering the property.
Having a dedicated holding paddock for livestock.
Controlling weeds before they seed or spread.
Monitoring property regularly for weed incursions.
Checking watercourses and boundaries for weeds.
Inspecting feed distribution areas and new stock locations.
Using the Department of Primary Industries Weedwise app for identification and management.
Contacting local authority for weed control advice.
Referencing NSW DPI website for control advice.
Understanding which control techniques are appropriate for specific weeds.
